mapper.insert: insert into vd_stu (num, name, password, sex, clsid, dorid, flag) values (#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "123456", #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cls,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1)
mapper.select: select id, num, name, password, sex, clsid, dorid, flag from vd_stu

SELECT s.id, d.id as did, c.id as cid, s.num, s.name, s.sex, c.name as cls, d.dornum as dor, CONCAT(b.`name`,b.`no`,'号楼') as buildName, s.flag FROM vd_stu s,vd_cls c, vd_dor d, vd_build b where s.clsid = c.id and s.dorid = d.id and d.bid = b.id and s.name = #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and s.password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
